name: realzapoteca
description: Primary landing page for Real Zapoteca

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && mkdir dist\css dist\js dist\img
scripts.prebuild:css: node-sass -r -o dist/css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map true --source-map-contents src/styles
scripts.build:css: postcss --use autoprefixer < dist/css/main.css | postcss --use cssnano > dist/css/main.min.css
scripts.build:js: browserify src/scripts/index.js > dist/js/main.js && uglifyjs dist/js/main.js -o dist/js/main.min.js -c -m
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && copy src\index.html dist\index.html

author: Alexander Bell
